column2: Mera Khoon 7 point hain khoon badhane ke liye kya karna hai
column3:
Agar aapka khoon 7 point hai, toh aapko kuch khaas khana chahiye. Aapko iron se bhara khana khana chahiye jaise:
 
 1. Hari sabziyan (jaise palak, methi)
 2. Daal (rajma, chana)
 3. Gur (jaggery) aur khajoor (dates)
 4. Dried fruits jaise kishmish (raisins)
 
 Vitamin C wale khane, jaise narangi (orange) ya amla, ke saath iron khane se khoon badhne mein madad 
 Aapko doctor se bhi mil lena chahiye.

column2: Preganancy me khoon kitna point hona chahiye
column3:
Pregnancy me khoon ki matra yaani hemoglobin 11 g/dl se zyada honi chahiye.
 Agar aapki hemoglobin ki matra 11 g/dl se kam hai, toh aapko iron aur folic acid ki goli leni chahiye. Doctor se puchke aapko yeh goli lena zaroori hai. Yeh aapki aur aapke baby ki sehat ke liye bahut zaruri hai.
